subTopics.title: Pharmacotherapy of hypertension based on the four possible mechanisms of hypertension

quizzes.question: Which drug class is used to decrease LV systolic performance as part of hypertension management?
How does a high intravascular volume cause hypertension?
quizzes.goodAnswer: By causing an excess of venous return, leading to elevated LVEDV
quizzes.wrongAnswer_1: By reducing the blood volume and LVEDV
quizzes.wrongAnswer_2: By decreasing arterial resistance and Ea
quizzes.wrongAnswer_3: By increasing diastolic function through reduced resistance

quizzes.question: Which mechanism of hypertension involves an elevated effective arterial elastance (Ea)?
quizzes.goodAnswer: High resistance or low compliance of the arterial tree

quizzes.question: What is a common side effect of thiazide diuretics?
Which class of drugs is synergistic with beta-blockers in hypertension treatment?
How do ACE inhibitors help in the management of hypertension?
quizzes.goodAnswer: By reducing angiotensin II and aldosterone levels
quizzes.wrongAnswer_1: By blocking alpha and beta receptors

quizzes.question: Which antihypertensive drug class offers cardiovascular benefits beyond blood pressure control?
What is a consideration when using ACE inhibitors in patients with renal artery stenosis?
quizzes.goodAnswer: They may cause renal dysfunction or failure
quizzes.wrongAnswer_1: They enhance the effects of beta-blockers
